technique_name: 提膝（独立） Ti Xi Dú Li (Single Knee Raised Position)
deduction_content: 击响腿脚尖未过肩 - Toes of slapped foot not above shoulder height
未击响 - Slap missed and/or inaudible

questions.question: What is the error code for Ti Xi Dú Li (Single Knee Raised Position)?
What are the two main deduction points for Ti Xi Dú Li?
questions.answer: Deductions are applied when: 1) Toes of slapped foot are not above shoulder height, and 2) Slap is missed and/or inaudible.

questions.question: What is the correct foot position for Ti Xi Dú Li?
questions.answer: The toes of the slapped foot should be above shoulder height and the slap should be audible.
